overview:
Ryan McDonough is Chief Financial Officer at Ning, where he is responsible for financial planning to help Ning achieve its business objectives and scale for the future.

Previously, Ryan was a Partner with Constantin Partners, a venture fund based in the San Francisco Bay Area. At Constantin he invested in and worked closely with early stage technology companies. Prior to Constantin, Ryan was with McKinsey & Company, where he served a range of clients in the high-tech, financial and telecom spaces.

Ryan is on the Board of The V Foundation Wine Celebration, an annual charity wine auction that has raised over $35 million for cancer research. Ryan did his undergraduate work at Haas School of Business, University of California, Berkeley, and holds an M.B.A. from the Wharton School at University of Pennsylvania.
